languages.text: "Если вы успокаиваете себя мыслью, что мы больше не услышим о Кунраде, то совершенно напрасно. Вы разрушили его планы, тщательно подготовленное и выпестованное предательство. Он обязательно попробует нанести вам удар, пользуясь своими контактами и знаниями протектората. Вопрос только в том, сможете ли вы, Лорд-капитан, предугадать его следующие шаги".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы успокаиваете себя мыслью, что мы больше не услышим о Кунраде, то совершенно напрасно. Вы разрушили его планы, тщательно подготовленное и выпестованное предательство. Он обязательно попробует нанести вам удар, пользуясь своими контактами и знаниями торговой империи. Вопрос только в том, сможете ли вы, Лорд-капитан, предугадать его следующие шаги".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."
languages.original_text: "Если вы успокаиваете себя мыслью, что мы больше не услышим о Кунраде, то совершенно напрасно. Вы разрушили его планы, тщательно подготовленное и выпестованное предательство. Он обязательно попробует нанести вам удар, пользуясь своими контактами и знаниями протектората. Вопрос только в том, сможете ли вы, Лорд-капитан, предугадать его следующие шаги".

traits.locale_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the trade empire to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the trade empire to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the trade empire to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如果您以为我们再也不会听到昆拉德的消息了，那您恐怕要失望了。虽然您挫败了他的计划，看穿了他精心策划的背叛行为，但他一定会对您进行报复。他会通过他对王朝的了解，通过安插在王朝的内应对您下手。唯一的问题是，您能否预见到他接下来的行动，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: “如果您以为我们再也不会听到昆拉德的消息了，那您恐怕要失望了。虽然您挫败了他的计划，看穿了他精心策划的背叛行为，但他一定会对您进行报复。他会通过他对王朝的了解，通过安插在王朝的内应对您下手。唯一的问题是，您能否预见到他接下来的行动，舰长大人？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

languages.text: «Si está reconfortándose en el hecho de que no volverá a saber de Kunrad, le espera una gran decepción. Ha frustrado sus planes, su cuidada y compleja traición. No dudará en atacarle usando sus contactos y sus conocimientos sobre el protectorado para tal fin. La pregunta, Lord Capitán, es si podrá anticiparse a sus siguientes pasos».
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: «Si está reconfortándose en el hecho de que no volverá a saber de Kunrad, le espera una gran decepción. Ha frustrado sus planes, su cuidada y compleja traición. No dudará en atacarle usando sus contactos y sus conocimientos sobre el protectorado para tal fin. La pregunta, Lord Capitán, es si podrá anticiparse a sus siguientes pasos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「クンラッドの消息をもう聞くことがないだろうと安堵しているのならば、失望する覚悟をしていただきたい。あなたは彼の計画を阻止し、綿密に計画され、育てられた裏切りを阻止しました。彼は必ずあなたを襲おうとし、そのために保護国家の人脈と知識を利用するでしょう。ロード・キャプテン、要点は、あなたが彼の次の行動を予測できるかどうかです」
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッドの消息をもう聞くことがないだろうと安堵しているのならば、失望する覚悟をしていただきたい。あなたは彼の計画を阻止し、綿密に計画され、育てられた裏切りを阻止しました。彼は必ずあなたを襲おうとし、そのために保護国家の人脈と知識を利用するでしょう。ロード・キャプテン、要点は、あなたが彼の次の行動を予測できるかどうかです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn euch der Gedanke Trost spendet, dass wir von Kunrad nichts mehr hören werden, macht Euch auf eine Enttäuschung gefasst. Ihr habt seine Pläne vereitelt, seinen penibel geplanten und behutsam genährten Verrat. Er wird gewiss versuchen, Euch zu attackieren, und er wird dafür seine Kontakte und sein Wissen das Protektorat betreffend nutzen. Die Frage ist nur, Lord Captain, ob Ihr seine nächsten Schritte vorausahnen könntet."
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn euch der Gedanke Trost spendet, dass wir von Kunrad nichts mehr hören werden, macht Euch auf eine Enttäuschung gefasst. Ihr habt seine Pläne vereitelt, seinen penibel geplanten und behutsam genährten Verrat. Er wird gewiss versuchen, Euch zu attackieren, und er wird dafür seine Kontakte und sein Wissen das Protektorat betreffend nutzen. Die Frage ist nur, Lord Captain, ob Ihr seine nächsten Schritte vorausahnen könntet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous vous consolez en vous disant qu'au moins, nous n'entendrons plus jamais de Kunrad, préparez-vous à être {mf|déçu|déçue}. Vous avez contrecarré ses plans, la trahison qu'il avait mise sur pied avec le plus grand soin. Il ne fait aucun doute qu'il tentera de vous le faire payer, en se servant de ses contacts et de sa connaissance du protectorat. Une seule question se pose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : serez-vous capable d'anticiper ses prochaines actions ? »
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous vous consolez en vous disant qu'au moins, nous n'entendrons plus jamais de Kunrad, préparez-vous à être {mf|déçu|déçue}. Vous avez contrecarré ses plans, la trahison qu'il avait mise sur pied avec le plus grand soin. Il ne fait aucun doute qu'il tentera de vous le faire payer, en se servant de ses contacts et de sa connaissance du protectorat. Une seule question se pose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : serez-vous capable d'anticiper ses prochaines actions ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kunrad'a bir daha rastlamayacağımızı düşünüyorsanız yanıldığınızı söylemeliyim. Planlarını titizce bozup beslediği hıyanetini boşa çıkardınız. Şüphesiz ki buna karşılık vermeye kalkışacaktır. Bunun için bağlantılarını ve protektoraya ilişkin bildiklerini de kullanacaktır. Asıl soru Lord Kaptan, onun atacağı adımları önceden görüp göremeyeceğiniz..."
languages.original_text: "If you are taking comfort in the thought that we will hear no more of Kunrad, prepare to be disappointed. You thwarted his plans, his meticulously plotted and nurtured treachery. He is sure to attempt to strike at you, and he will use his contacts and knowledge of the protectorate to do so. The only question, Lord Captain, is whether you will be able to anticipate his next steps."

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad'a bir daha rastlamayacağımızı düşünüyorsanız yanıldığınızı söylemeliyim. Planlarını, titizce kurgulayıp beslediği hıyanetini boşa çıkardınız. Buna karşılık vermeye kalkışacaktır, şüphesiz. Bunun için bağlantılarını ve protektoraya ilişkin bildiklerini de kullanacaktır. Sual ise, Lord Kaptan, onun atacağı adımları önceden görüp göremeyeceğinizle ilgili."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
